law.text: The basic course offered by the training program shall consist of not less than forty (40) hours of instruction or training and shall consist of subjects appropriate for the basic training of law enforcement telecommunicators in the technique of emergency services communications. The Kentucky Law Enforcement Council shall approve all training curriculum and instructions.
law.history: Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 315, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1986.
